title: History of rugby union matches between France and Italy
text:
<a href="France%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">France</a> and <a href="Italy%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy</a> have played each other at <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> a total of 42 matches, with France winning 39 times, Italy winning 3 times, and no matches drawn. Since 2007, the winner of the meeting between the teams in the <a href="Six%20Nations%20Tournament">Six Nations Tournament</a> has received the <a href="Giuseppe%20Garibaldi%20Trophy">Giuseppe Garibaldi Trophy</a>.
XV Results.
Below are a list of matches that Italy has awarded matches test match status by virtue of awarding caps, but France did not award caps.
